name: Ctrl V
description:
My first GMTK entry,

very hastily put together. Built in the C Programming language, utilizing SDL2 for Graphics and sound.

It's a simple puzzle game where you are out of control, as in "your moves are a resource". You can collect new ones, and have a limited supply of each.

I made this together with my sister. She did graphics, I did the programming.

There is no sound, and only 8 levels so far, as I could not use the full 48 hours unfortunately.

There is however, a small tutorial and story.

All in all, I still hope you enjoy it, as I certainly had a lot of fun during the jam! I will definitely try and partake in the next one. Oh, and Thanks for playing!
